articles.author: David Hollerith
articles.title: Warren Buffett sells stakes in two banks, raises Bank of America bet - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: The Oracle of Omaha has made it clear that he is still cautious about holding many bank stocks.
articles.content:
Warren Buffett cut his exposure to two more banks last quarter while raising his commitment to Bank of America (BAC) and buying new stock in Capital One (COF).
The billionaire's investment conglomer… [+2741 chars]
